title: How to Get Zorua in Pokémon White

steps.title: Get the fateful encounter Celebi.
steps.content: Get the fateful encounter Celebi. This Celebi was a promotional Pokémon distributed in 2011 at GameStop and during a mall tour for Pokémon Black and White. If you didn't pick one up at those events, you will have to borrow one from another player or use action replay cheats to add one to your party.

steps.title: Get the Relocator.
steps.content: Get the Relocator. The Relocator allows you to transfer promotional Pokémon into the game. To get the Relocator option added to your menu, follow these steps: Go to Castelia City and find the Name Rating Services on the left side of the street north of the central plaza. [1] X Research source Go to the 11th floor and talk to a scientist in the lower right corner. He will ask you for two sets of passwords. Answer his questions with "Everyone + Happy" and then "Simple + Connection." This will add the Relocator option to your Main Menu.

steps.title: Use the Relocator to add Celebi to your party.
steps.content: Use the Relocator to add Celebi to your party. Restart your DS and select the Relocator option from your main menu. Set up the DS wireless connection with another DS system and use the "download play" option to get the promotional Celebi into your system.

steps.title: Go to Castelia City.
steps.content: Go to Castelia City. You can get there on foot either from Route 4 through the desert or via the Skyarrow Bridge. [2] X Research source Make sure you have a Pokéball, an open space in your party, and a Celebi in your party.

steps.title: Find the Game Freak building and go inside.
steps.content: Find the Game Freak building and go inside. Game Freak HQ is a black building on the right side of Castelia Street, the east-most of the city's four radial streets. Coming off the Skyarrow Bridge simply turn down the first street that opens to your right. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Talk to the boy next to the bar.
steps.content: Talk to the boy next to the bar. There will be a boy and a girl standing in front of a bar in the first room you see upon entering. The boy is the one on the left. Walk up and talk to him. If you have Celebi in your party, it will pop out, and the boy will say "Yip yap!" and reveal himself to be Zorua in disguise. The girl standing next to him will suggest that Celebi and Zorua are good friends and that Zorua would like to go with you.

steps.title: Answer "yes" to the prompt.
steps.content: Answer "yes" to the prompt. A box will pop up asking if you would like to add Zorua to your party. Select yes.

steps.title: Select a Pokéball from your inventory.
steps.content: Select a Pokéball from your inventory. Any kind of poké ball will do. Zorua will go into the ball and join your party!

steps.title: Go to Driftveil city.
steps.content: Go to Driftveil city. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Walk up the stairs north of the Pokémon Center, into the building up there.
steps.content: Walk up the stairs north of the Pokémon Center, into the building up there.

steps.title: Talk to Team Plasma.
steps.content: Talk to Team Plasma. They will give you a Zorua.

steps.title: Trade the Zorua with another device onto Pokémon Black/White.
steps.content: Trade the Zorua with another device onto Pokémon Black/White. Or, you can keep it on Pokémon Black/White 2.
